Load spark

```{r}
library(sparklyr)
library(dplyr)
library(arrow)
conf <- spark_config()
conf$`sparklyr.shell.driver-memory` <- "8G"
spark <- spark_connect(master = "local", config = conf)
```


```{r}

```



## cleanup

Finally, close the spark session again.
```{r}
spark_disconnect(spark)
```
